price: Kuma wanda ya tũba,* kuma ya aikata aiki mai kyau, to, lalle ne sai ya tũba zuwa gaAllah.
arabic: وَمَن تَابَ وَعَمِلَ صَٰلِحٗا فَإِنَّهُۥ يَتُوبُ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ مَتَابٗا
footnotes: * Wanda ya tũba daga kõwane irin zunubi, waɗanda aka ambata da waɗanda ba a ambata ba, kõ dã laifinsa kãfirci ne, to, sai ya tũba zuwa ga Allah kawai, tũba ta gaskiya, lalle ne Allah zai karɓi tũbarsa matuƙar ajalin mutuwa bai sauka a kansa ba.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.
